Name: Broadcom SymantecDLP
Author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
Description:
The [Broadcom Symantec Data Loss Prevention (DLP)](https://www.broadcom.com/products/cyber-security/information-protection/data-loss-prevention) connector allows you to easily connect your Symantec DLP with Microsoft Sentinel.

1. **Broadcom SymantecDLP via AMA** - This data connector helps in ingesting Broadcom SymantecDLP logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the new Azure Monitor Agent. Learn more about ingesting using the new Azure Monitor Agent [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/connect-cef-ama). **Microsoft recommends using this Data Connector**.

2. **Broadcom SymantecDLP via Legacy Agent** - This data connector helps in ingesting Broadcom SymantecDLP logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the legacy Log Analytics agent.

**NOTE:** Microsoft recommends installation of Broadcom SymantecDLP via AMA Connector. Legacy connector uses the Log Analytics agent which is about to be deprecated by **Aug 31, 2024,** and thus should only be installed where AMA is not supported. Using MMA and AMA on same machine can cause log duplication and extra ingestion cost [more details](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/ama-migrate).
